title: Keep in the swim
creator_credit: Australian Road Safety Council and Movietonenews
brief_description: The need to obey rules to insure safety on the roads is illustrated by pictures of good and bad driving. The lesson is reinforced by shots of the champion swimmers Jon and Ilsa Konrads who in their training to become champions have to follow rules set out by the laws of swimming.
